body_html: The reason I wanted to move it was effectively to fuse it with the C++ API so that I could expose more and more functionality into python.h by just having it include the C++ API. Instead torch.h will remain its own little thing for now, and we can make a switch before 0.5
body_text: The reason I wanted to move it was effectively to fuse it with the C++ API so that I could expose more and more functionality into python.h by just having it include the C++ API. Instead torch.h will remain its own little thing for now, and we can make a switch before 0.5
body: The reason I wanted to move it was effectively to fuse it with the C++ API so that I could expose more and more functionality into `python.h` by just having it include the C++ API. Instead `torch.h` will remain its own little thing for now, and we can make a switch before 0.5
